attributes.action: Stop blocking efforts to ensure total equality for prospective gay parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop trying to block proposals that ensure gay people are not discriminated against in adoption law, by the catholic, or any other, church. Put the needs of children first, rather than the prejudices of religious institutions.  Children not churches!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
